price: (111) And I know not; perhaps it[912] is a trial for you and enjoyment for a time."
arabic: وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِي لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتۡنَةٞ لَّكُمۡ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-in adrī laʿallahu fit'natun lakum wamatāʿun ilā ḥīnin
